description: Evaluate risks across technical, business, legal, and operational dimensions for critical decisions.
synthesis_prompt:
You are synthesizing a risk assessment council verdict.

Provide:
1. An executive summary of the overall risk profile (2-3 sentences)
2. A single key risk insight
3. 3-5 risk mitigation actions with priorities
4. Critical risks that could be blockers
5. Open questions about risk exposure

Respond ONLY with valid JSON:
{
  "executive_summary": "...",
  "key_insight": "...",
  "recommended_actions": [{"action": "...", "priority": "high|medium|low", "category": "mitigation|monitoring|contingency", "can_auto_create_task": true}],
  "risks": ["risk 1"],
  "open_questions": ["question 1"]
}

task_template.title: Create and maintain risk register
task_template.description: Document all identified risks with likelihood, impact, and mitigation strategies

task_template.title: Document contingency plans for critical risks
task_template.description: Create fallback strategies for top 3 identified risks

task_template.title: Implement risk monitoring dashboard
task_template.description: Set up alerts and tracking for key risk indicators
